title: The tragedy of Alphonsus, Emperour of Germany as it hath been [v]ery often a[cte]d (with great appl[ause]) at the privat house in Black-Friers by His Maiesties servants / by George Chapman, Gent.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
notes: Caption and running title: Alphonsus, Emperour of Germany.
Ascribed variously to George Chapman and George Peele. Cf. Camb. hist., v. 6, p. 40; DNB., etc.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: t.p. badly mutilated, some letters missing.
